markdownRemark.html: Just found this out that Michael Crichton has passed away unexpectedly. Crichton was one of my favorite fiction authors, and he was also dabbled as film director as well.

frontmatter.title: One of my favorite authors, Michael Crichton, is Dead at 66
Oracle has released a free version of their database server
